Detailed Description

Access and modify replication settings stored in an ITTIA DB SQL database.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ ReplicationCatalog()

storage::ittiadb::ReplicationCatalog::ReplicationCatalog ( Connection &  connection_p)
inlineexplicit

Construct an object to access the catalog of a given database connection.

The connection must be opened before using any other member functions.
